  <!-- Performance API Polyfills -->
  <script>
  (function () {
    var noop = function noop() {};
    if ("performance" in window === false) {
      window.performance = {};
    }
    window.performance.mark = performance.mark || noop;
    window.performance.measure = performance.measure || noop;
    if ("now" in window.performance === false) {
      var nowOffset = Date.now();
      if (performance.timing && performance.timing.navigationStart) {
        nowOffset = performance.timing.navigationStart;
      }
      window.performance.now = function now() {
        return Date.now() - nowOffset;
      };
    }
  })();
  </script>

    (function () {
      var now = Date.now()

<script type="text/javascript">
    var bodyCacheable = true;
    
    var exclusionReason = {"shouldRender":true,"forced":false};
    var ssrInfo = {"cacheExclusionReason":"Platform Apps","renderBodyTime":686,"renderTimeStamp":1694004914830}
</script>





    <!--pageHtmlEmbeds.bodyStart start-->
    <script type="wix/htmlEmbeds" id="pageHtmlEmbeds.bodyStart start"></script>
    
    <script type="wix/htmlEmbeds" id="pageHtmlEmbeds.bodyStart end"></script>
    <!--pageHtmlEmbeds.bodyStart end-->




<script id="wix-first-paint">
    if (window.ResizeObserver &&
        (!window.PerformanceObserver || !PerformanceObserver.supportedEntryTypes || PerformanceObserver.supportedEntryTypes.indexOf('paint') === -1)) {
        new ResizeObserver(function (entries, observer) {
            entries.some(function (entry) {
                var contentRect = entry.contentRect;
                if (contentRect.width > 0 && contentRect.height > 0) {
                    requestAnimationFrame(function (now) {
                        window.wixFirstPaint = now;
                        dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('wixFirstPaint'));
                    });
                    observer.disconnect();
                    return true;
                }
            });
        }).observe(document.body);
    }
</script>

url("https://static.wixstatic.com/ufonts/41634b_597a9d5995e14be99c3c8906224f1ebd/ttf/file.ttf") format("ttf");
}

980px) * 0.5);left:0px;grid-area:1 / 1 / 2 / 2;justify-self:start;align-self:start}[data-mesh-id=Containerb9hmrinlineContent-gridContainer] > [id="comp-lecvhoyv"]{position:relative;margin:0px 0px 0 calc((100% - #comp-kfdlkxvr { --rd:0px;--trans1:border-color 0.4s ease 0s, background-color 0.4s ease 0s;--shd:none;--fnt:normal normal normal 13px/1.4em helvetica-w01-light,helvetica-w02-light,sans-serif;--trans2:color 0.4s ease 0s;--txt:255,255,255;--brw:0px;--bg:87,189,188;--brd:var(--color_11);--bgh:var(--color_12);--brdh:var(--color_11);--txth:var(--color_15);--bgd:204,204,204;--alpha-bgd:1;--brdd:204,204,204;--alpha-brdd:1;--txtd:255,255,255;--alpha-txtd:1;--boxShadowToggleOn-shd:none;--alpha-txt:1;--alpha-brdh:1;--alpha-brd:1;--alpha-txth:1;--alpha-bg:1;--alpha-bgh:1;--static-spx:1px;--shc-mutated-brightness:44,95,94;--label-align:center;--label-text-align:center }#comp-kfdlkxv31 { --static-spx:1px;height:auto }#comp-kfdlkxvi2 { --static-spx:1px;--min-height:261px;height:auto }#b9hmr { --static-spx:1px;width:auto;min-height:40px }#comp-lecvhoyu { --static-spx:1px;--bg-overlay-color:transparent;--bg-gradient:none;min-width:980px }#comp-lecvhoyv { --static-spx:1px;--bg-overlay-color:transparent;--bg-gradient:none;min-width:980px }#comp-kfdlkxtz { --static-spx:1px;--bg-overlay-color:transparent;--bg-gradient:none;--padding:0px;--margin:0px;min-width:980px;--firstChildMarginTop:-1px;--lastChildMarginBottom:-1px;--items-direction:row }#comp-kfdlkxve { --static-spx:1px;--bg-overlay-color:transparent;--bg-gradient:none;--padding:0px;--margin:0px;min-width:980px;--firstChildMarginTop:-1px;--lastChildMarginBottom:-1px;--items-direction:row }#comp-kfdlkxv1 { --static-spx:1px;--bg-overlay-color:rgb(87, 189, 188);--bg-gradient:none;width:100%;--column-width:980px;--column-flex:980 }#comp-kfdlkxvg2 { --static-spx:1px;--bg-overlay-color:transparent;--bg-gradient:none;width:100%;--column-width:980px;--column-flex:980 }#pageBackground_b9hmr { --bg-position:absolute;--bg-overlay-color:rgb(var(--color_15));--bg-gradient:none }
</style>

0:s.contextWindow)||window;d.wixCustomElements=s,Object.assign(d.customElementNamespace,{mediaServices:u,environmentConsts:r,requestUrl:c,staticVideoUrl:a.staticVideoUrl}),oe(Object.assign({},u),s.contextWindow,r),s.defineWixImage(u,r),s.defineWixBgMedia(u),window.__imageClientApi__=K.imageClientApi})({experiments:de,media:le,requestUrl:he})}},function(e){e.O(0,[6008,774,8050],(function(){return t=79139,e(e.s=t);var t}));e.O()}]);
//# sourceMappingURL=https://static.parastorage.com/services/wix-thunderbolt/dist/initCustomElements.inline.23268a47.bundle.min.js.map</script>


<div id="SITE_CONTAINER"><style id="STYLE_OVERRIDES_ID">#SITE_HEADER-placeholder{height:67px;}</style><div id="main_MF" class="wix-global-css"><div id="SCROLL_TO_TOP" class="Vd6aQZ ignore-focus id="b9hmr" class="dBAkHi b9hmr"><div class="PFkO7r wixui-page" data-testid="page-bg"></div><div class="HT5ybB"><div id="Containerb9hmr" class="Containerb9hmr SPY_vo"><div id="comp-lecvhoyu" tabindex="-1" class="Oqnisf comp-lecvhoyu wixui-section"><div id="bgLayers_comp-lecvhoyu" data-hook="bgLayers" class="MW5IWV"><div data-testid="colorUnderlay" class="LWbAav data-mesh-id="comp-lecvhoyuinlineContent-gridContainer" data-testid="mesh-container-content"><section id="comp-kfdlkxtz" class="comp-kfdlkxtz CohWsy wixui-column-strip"><div id="bgLayers_comp-kfdlkxtz" data-hook="bgLayers" class="if7Vw2"><div data-testid="colorUnderlay" class="tcElKx i1tH8h"></div><div id="bgMedia_comp-kfdlkxtz" class="wG8dni"></div></div><div data-testid="columns" class="V5AUxf"><div id="comp-kfdlkxv1" class="comp-kfdlkxv1 YzqVVZ wixui-column-strip__column"><div id="bgLayers_comp-kfdlkxv1" data-hook="bgLayers" class="MW5IWV"><div data-testid="colorUnderlay" class="LWbAav Kv1aVt"></div><div id="bgMedia_comp-kfdlkxv1" class="VgO9Yg"></div></div><div data-mesh-id="comp-kfdlkxv1inlineContent" data-testid="inline-content" class=""><div data-mesh-id="comp-kfdlkxv1inlineContent-gridContainer" data-testid="mesh-container-content"><div id="comp-kfdlkxv31" class="BaOVQ8 tz5f0K comp-kfdlkxv31 wixui-rich-text" data-testid="richTextElement"><h1 class="font_3 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:60px; line-height:1.3em; text-align:center;"><span style="font-family:wfont_41634b_597a9d5995e14be99c3c8906224f1ebd,wf_597a9d5995e14be99c3c89062,orig_glegoo;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Privacy policy</span></h1></div></div></div></div></div></section></div></div></section><section id="comp-lecvhoyv" tabindex="-1" class="Oqnisf comp-lecvhoyv wixui-section"><div id="bgLayers_comp-lecvhoyv" data-hook="bgLayers" class="MW5IWV"><div data-testid="colorUnderlay" class="LWbAav Kv1aVt"></div><div id="bgMedia_comp-lecvhoyv" class="VgO9Yg"></div></div><div data-mesh-id="comp-lecvhoyvinlineContent" data-testid="inline-content" class=""><div data-mesh-id="comp-lecvhoyvinlineContent-gridContainer" data-testid="mesh-container-content"><section id="comp-kfdlkxve" class="comp-kfdlkxve CohWsy wixui-column-strip"><div id="bgLayers_comp-kfdlkxve" data-hook="bgLayers" class="if7Vw2"><div data-testid="colorUnderlay" class="tcElKx i1tH8h"></div><div id="bgMedia_comp-kfdlkxve" class="wG8dni"></div></div><div data-testid="columns" class="V5AUxf"><div id="comp-kfdlkxvg2" class="comp-kfdlkxvg2 YzqVVZ wixui-column-strip__column"><div id="bgLayers_comp-kfdlkxvg2" data-hook="bgLayers" class="MW5IWV"><div data-testid="colorUnderlay" class="LWbAav Kv1aVt"></div><div id="bgMedia_comp-kfdlkxvg2" class="VgO9Yg"></div></div><div data-mesh-id="comp-kfdlkxvg2inlineContent" data-testid="inline-content" class=""><div data-mesh-id="comp-kfdlkxvg2inlineContent-gridContainer" data-testid="mesh-container-content"><div id="comp-kfdlkxvi2" class="KcpHeO tz5f0K comp-kfdlkxvi2 wixui-rich-text" data-testid="richTextElement"><h6 class="font_6 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:25px;">Introduction</h6>

<p class="font_7 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">As part of its activity, the company CONVRGENCE, whose head office is located at 20 rue de l'obélisque – 77610 Neufmoutiers en Brie, is required to collect and process information, some of which is qualified as "personal data". CONVRGENCE attaches great importance to respect for privacy, and only uses data in a responsible and confidential manner and for a specific purpose.</p>

<p class="font_7 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">&nbsp;</p>

<h6 class="font_6 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:25px;">Personal data</h6>

<ul class="font_6 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:20px;">
<li class="wixui-rich-text__text">
<h6 class="font_6 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:20px;"><span style="font-size:20px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Data transmitted directly</span></h6>
</li>
</ul>

<p class="font_7 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">These data are those that you send us directly, via a contact form or by direct contact by email. The fields "first and last name", "company or organization" and "email" are mandatory in the contact form.</p>

<p class="font_7 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">​</p>

<ul class="font_6 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:20px;">
<li class="wixui-rich-text__text">
<h6 class="font_6 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:20px;"><span style="font-size:20px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Data collected automatically</span></h6>
</li>
</ul>

<p class="font_7 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">During your visits, once your consent has been given, we may collect “web analytics” type information relating to your browsing, the duration of your consultation, your IP address, your browser type and version. The technology used is the cookie.</p>

<p class="font_7 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">​</p>

<p class="font_7 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">We do not store or track the data of users using Natur'360. No IP address, no email, no account name.</p>

<p class="font_7 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">​</p>

<h6 class="font_6 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:25px;">Data usage</h6>

<p class="font_7 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">The data that you transmit to us directly are used for the purpose of contacting you again and/or in the context of the request that you make to us. "Web analytics" data is collected anonymously (by recording anonymous IP addresses) by Google Analytics, and allows us to measure the audience of our website, consultations and any errors in order to constantly improve the experience. users. These data are used by CONVRGENCE, responsible for data processing, and will never be transferred to a third party or used for purposes other than those detailed above.</p>

<p class="font_7 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">​</p>

<h6 class="font_6 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:25px;">Legal basis</h6>

<p class="font_7 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">Personal data is collected only after mandatory consent of the user. This consent is validly collected (check buttons), free, clear and unequivocal.</p>

<p class="font_7 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">​</p>

<h6 class="font_6 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:25px;">Your rights regarding personal data</h6>

<p class="font_7 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">You have the right to consult, request modification or deletion of all your personal data. You can also withdraw your consent to the processing of your data.</p>

<p class="font_7 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">​</p>

<h6 class="font_6 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:25px;">Contact Data Protection Officer</h6>

<p class="font_7 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">Valérie Thévenin - <a data-auto-recognition="true" href="mailto:valerie@convrgence.fr" class="wixui-rich-text__text">valerie@convrgence.fr</a> - <a data-auto-recognition="true" href="mailto:contact@convrgence.fr" class="wixui-rich-text__text">contact@convrgence.fr</a></p>

<p class="font_7 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">​</p>

<h6 class="font_6 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:25px;">Ownership and License</h6>

<p class="font_7 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">The Terms applicable to ConVRgence and its works protect the creators and their ownership of the Natur'360 product and brand. The Experience is owned and operated by ConVRgence. The Experience, including relevant content, visual interfaces, interactive features, information, graphics, design, compilation, computer code, products, services and all other elements, including all rights associated intellectual property, are the sole and exclusive property of ConVRgence.</p>

<p class="font_7 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">Accordingly, you may not copy, modify, perform or publicly display, transmit, publish, edit, adapt, create derivative works of, or use the Experience, or aspects of the Experience, without the express, written and prior to ConVRgence.</p>

<p class="font_7 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">The Natur’360: Immersive Well-being application and the content present in the Oculus store are exclusively for personal use, and may not be used for commercial purposes.</p>

<p class="font_7 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:16px;">​</p></div></div></div></div></div></section><div class="comp-kfdlkxvr R6ex7N" id="comp-kfdlkxvr" aria-disabled="false"><a data-testid="linkElement" href="https://www.convrgence.fr/en" target="_self" class="kuTaGy wixui-button zKbzSQ" aria-disabled="false"><span class="M3I7Z2 wixui-button__label">Return</span></a></div></div></div></section></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></main><div id="soapAfterPagesContainer" class="page-without-sosp page-without-sosp"><div data-mesh-id="soapAfterPagesContainerinlineContent" data-testid="inline-content" class=""><div data-mesh-id="soapAfterPagesContainerinlineContent-gridContainer" data-testid="mesh-container-content"><div id="CONTROLLER_COMP_CUSTOM_ID" style="display:none"></div></div></div></div><footer class="SITE_FOOTER_WRAPPER" tabindex="-1" id="SITE_FOOTER_WRAPPER"><div id="SITE_FOOTER" class="xU8fqS SITE_FOOTER wixui-footer" tabindex="-1"><div class="_C0cVf"><div class="_4XcTfy" data-testid="screenWidthContainerBg"></div></div><div class="U4Bvut"><div class="G5K6X8"><div class="gUbusX" data-testid="screenWidthContainerBgCenter"></div></div><div class="CJF7A2"><div data-mesh-id="SITE_FOOTERinlineContent" data-testid="inline-content" class=""><div data-mesh-id="SITE_FOOTERinlineContent-gridContainer" data-testid="mesh-container-content"><div id="hyio5hbu" class="KcpHeO tz5f0K hyio5hbu wixui-rich-text" data-testid="richTextElement"><p class="font_9 wixui-rich-text__text" style="line-height:normal;
